DIA_ArenaGuard_ArenaNoInvite_03_01: A place for tournament participants. Everyone is counting on you to join at the upcoming tournament.
DIA_ArenaGuard_ArenaNoInvite_03_02: A place for tournament participants. Fear not, you won't get a chance to see what it looks like from the inside.
DIA_ArenaGuard_ArenaNoInvite_Details_03_: Under the stands there is a special cage for various beasts. Admittedly, it hasn't been used for a long time, but apparently Cortez with Proximo came up with something special this time.
DIA_ArenaGuard_ArenaSignedIn_15_01: I am one of the participants in the tournament.
DIA_ArenaGuard_ArenaSignedIn_03_01: Yes, I heard. I'm opening the gate now. Come in and make yourself comfortable.
DIA_ArenaGuard_ArenaSignedIn_03_02: If you do well, you might even spend most of the evening there.
DIA_ArenaGuard_ArenaSignedIn_03_03: There should still be a Proximo inside. He'll explain everything to you.
DIA_ArenaGuard_Q306_GiveUp_15_01: I've had enough of this fight, I want to quit the tournament.
DIA_ArenaGuard_Q306_GiveUp_03_01: You did pretty well, are you sure?
DIA_ArenaGuard_Q306_GiveUp_Yes_03_01: Suit yourself, you're probably scared out because of Ben.
